title: Artificial intelligence may help reduce gadolinium dose in MRI

title_detail.value: Artificial intelligence may help reduce gadolinium dose in MRI

summary: Researchers are using artificial intelligence to reduce the dose of a contrast agent that may be left behind in the body after MRI exams, according to a new study.

summary_detail.value: Researchers are using artificial intelligence to reduce the dose of a contrast agent that may be left behind in the body after MRI exams, according to a new study.
